description: Associates a list of client devices with a core device. Use this API operation to specify which client devices can discover a core device through cloud discovery. With cloud discovery, client devices connect to IoT Greengrass to retrieve associated core devices' connectivity information and certificates. For more information, see Configure cloud discovery in the IoT Greengrass V2 Developer Guide.

parameters.name: entries
parameters.description: The list of client devices to associate. (dict) --- Contains a request to associate a client device with a core device. The BatchAssociateClientDeviceWithCoreDevice operation consumes a list of these requests. The name of the IoT thing that represents the client device to associate.

nested_params.name: thingName
nested_params.description: The name of the IoT thing that represents the client device to associate.

parameters.name: coreDeviceThingName
parameters.description: The name of the core device. This is also the name of the IoT thing.

nested_items.name: errorEntries
nested_items.description: The list of any errors for the entries in the request. Each error entry contains the name of the IoT thing that failed to associate.

nested_items.name: thingName
nested_items.description: The name of the IoT thing whose associate request failed.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The error code for the request.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A message that provides additional information about the error.
